actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain persons who were originally appointed as supplemental security income hearing examiners under pre-1976 provisions of title XVI of the Social Security Act shall without any restriction be deemed appointed as administrative law judges.

summary.text: Declares that specified persons previously appointed as temporary hearing examiners under the Supplemental Security Income program of the Social Security Act shall be considered appointed to career-absolute positions as hearing examiners.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain persons who were originally appointed as supplemental security income hearing examiners under pre-1976 provisions of title XVI of the Social Security Act shall without any restriction be deemed appointed as administrative law judges.
